dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.para: To the UNC Med Micro fellows, past and present—your dedication, curiosity, and passion have made me a better mentor, a better microbiologist, and a better person. I am grateful to each of you.
This book is dedicated to those who protect and share knowledge without limits or judgment, as well as to those who learn, teach, and keep the light of discovery alive.

para.emphasis: For my family and mentors—thank you for believing in me.

dedication.para: For the Lee family, for their generosity in sharing Al and Rhianna's story, and for all the families of the individuals whose stories are told in this edition.
